Description.Name: Permanent Contract for Valiant Airdrop
Description.Details: Due to your heavy pockets Vining Engineering and Salvage Team, a premier mech manufacturer on the gameworld Solaris VII, has offered you a contract with one of their mechwarriors. Purchasing this contract will permit the airdrop of an arena-ready Valiant V4-LNT-K7 when using a BattleMech Airdrop Beacon. This contract is permanent and does not expire. Hold Shift when deploying the airdrop ability to select a specific unit from among those available!
